description.value: Code system of concepts specifying the status of the use of the gender information for diagnosis related group (DRG) determination. US Realm. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DRG segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0749 (DRG Grouping Status)

description.value: A code that indicates the status of the concept
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Valid code; not used for grouping

definition.value: Valid code; not used for grouping

display.value: Invalid code; not used for grouping

definition.value: Invalid code; not used for grouping

display.value: Invalid code; code is relevant for grouping
